attributes.action: To not scrap the reformation of the Gender Recognition Act
attributes.additional_details:
The 'leak' of information about the scrapping of the two-year inquiry into a reformation of the Gender Recognition Act has shown dangerous ideals that could become reality within the Tory government.
To put it bluntly, this could KILL people, and encourage violence against trans women more than the current statistics - which rose 37% since 2018.
Another big issue is the suggested "crackdown" on 'quacks' - a dangerous proposition that they will make private trans healthcare less accessible.
attributes.background: Do not ignore the facts and data that over 70% of poll takers were in favor of the reformation of the Gender Recognition Act. To also blame the poll as being "hijacked" by trans rights groups is also disingenuous. Introducing a bathroom bill will actively kill & harm ALL women.

rejection.details:
Reform the Gender Recognition Act: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327108

Uphold current legal protections for transgender individuals and under 18s:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318175

Do not ban gender transition treatments for under 18s:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318025

Add gender identity to the characteristics protected under the Equality Act 2010:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301138

Require schools and colleges to have gender neutral toilets:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302997

Introduce Gender and Race equity for GCSE English Literature set texts:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324934

Allow for a gender neutral option on a passport, such as an "X":
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301083
